source: 如果我们发觉本手册页的内容由于过时而导致明显的混乱和抱怨时,我们就停止发布它.不可能有其他选择,象更新Info文件同时更新man 手册, 因为其他维护Gnu cc 的工作没有留给我们时间做这个.GNU 工程认为man 手册是过时产物, 应该把时间用到别的地方.
target: If we find that the content of this manual page is causing obvious confusion or complaints due to its obsolescence, we will stop publishing it. There cannot be another option, like updating the Infob file at the same time as updating the man manual, because other maintenance jobs for Gnu cc have not left us time to do this. The GNU engineering considers the man manual to be obsolete and should spend time elsewhere.

Note that certain combinations of options (e.g., ∀-x cpp-output-E') {i gee MEF =c compile or compile a source file, ETER. source: 这样就会关闭GNU Cc 中某些不兼容ANSI Cc 的特性关键字, 以及诸如unix 和vax 这些表明当迎和极少使用的ANSI trigraph 特性,以及禁上尽管使用了(译注:宿主环境(hosted environment) 下所有的标准库可用，main 函数返回一个int 值, 典型例子是除了内核以外几乎所有的程序.对应的独立环境(f£reestanding environment) 不存在标准库, 程序入口也不一定是main, 最明显的例子就是操作系统内核.详情参考gcc 网站最近的资料)
target: This turns off certain keywords in GNU Cc that do not support ANSI Cc, as well as certain ANSI trigraph features that indicate proper and rarely used ANSI trigraph attributes such as unix and vax, and turns it off despite its usage in all standard libraries in a hosted environment. The main function returns an int value; typical examples are almost all programs except for the kernel. The corresponding free-standing environment does not have a standard library, nor is the program port necessarily main, the most obvious example being the kernel within the operating system.
annotation:
MQM annotations:

Accuracy Errors
[Major]: Omission - The translation omits the explanation of the "hosted environment" and "freestanding environment" concepts, which are important for understanding the context.

Linguistic Convention Errors
[Minor]: Grammar - The sentence "The main function returns an int value; typical examples are almost all programs except for the kernel." has a grammatical issue. It should be "The main function returns an int value; typical examples are almost all programs except the kernel."

Style Errors
[Major]: Awkward expression - The phrase "turns it off despite its usage in all standard libraries in a hosted environment" is awkward and could be rephrased more naturally.
[Minor]: Literal translation - The translation of "表明当迎和极少使用的ANSI trigraph 特性" as "ANSI trigraph features that indicate proper and rarely used ANSI trigraph attributes" is a bit too literal and could be phrased more naturally.

No-error

source: 最近，美国对华“芯片战”大有升级之势——先是荷兰、日本两国在美国施压下，同意启动对华半导体制造设备出口的管制；后有外媒报道，美国政府正考虑切断美国供应商与华为公司之间的所有联系，禁止美国供应商向华为提供任何产品；拜登政府还准备公布一项行政命令，限制美国对敏感的中国科技行业的投资……2023年开年不久，美国在遏制中国半导体相关产业发展上就恶招不断。

source: 近年来，美国打击中国“芯”发展的动作从未停歇，一边精准打压对华半导体产供链，一边构建“去中国化”的半导体产业链联盟，图谋在先进半导体产业上彻底“甩开”中国。
target: In recent years, the United States has never stopped fighting against China's silicon and nickel development, while cracking down on the supply chain of semiconductor products from China, and building a semiconductor industry chain alliance to rival China's silicon, trying to completely open China in advanced semiconductor industry.
annotation:

Accuracy Errors
[Major]: Mistranslation - The phrase "打击中国'芯'发展" is translated as "fighting against China's silicon and nickel development", which is not accurate. The term "芯" refers to semiconductors or microchips, not silicon and nickel.
[Minor]: Addition - The phrase "图谋在先进半导体产业上彻底'甩开'中国" is translated as "trying to completely open China in advanced semiconductor industry", which adds the word "open" that is not present in the original text.

Terminology Errors
[Minor]: Incorrect term choice - The term "silicon and nickel" is used instead of the more accurate "semiconductors" or "microchips".

Linguistic Convention Errors
[Minor]: Grammar mistake - The phrase "一边精准打压对华半导体产供链" is translated as "while cracking down on the supply chain of semiconductor products from China", which has a grammatical error in the use of "产供链" (should be "供应链").

Style Errors
[Major]: Awkward expression - The phrase "图谋在先进半导体产业上彻底'甩开'中国" is translated as "trying to completely open China in advanced semiconductor industry", which is an awkward and unnatural expression.

source: 无论是拉拢韩国建立“技术同盟”，还是与韩国、日本和中国台湾地区建立芯片“四方联盟”，亦或借由美日印澳“四边机制”“印太经济框架”等机制建立半导体产业链“小圈子”，美国通过把政治化、阵营化、武器化的手段引入半导体产业，企图搭建美国主导的封闭产供链循环，从而弥补其在芯片制造领域的短板，维护其在全球芯片产业的优势地位。

source: 我想，这个小说集，以及它的标题，像是一种行为艺术，作者想表达的是，爱情不止是舞台上的悲欢离合，都市传说中的海枯石烂，也不只是你侬我侬的如胶似漆，爱情不止是以上也不应该被以上代表，爱情也是平淡如水的生活，枯燥无味的日复一日，也有对生活的无措，现实的逃避，未来的茫然。
target: I think the novella, as well as the title, is a kind of acting art, the author wants to convey that love is more than just the parting on stage and the sea of urban legends, not only that the love of me is like paint, love is not only above and should not be represented above, love is also life is bland like water, dull tasteless day after day, there are also the speechlessness of life, the escape from reality, the restlessness of the future.

The original text suggests that the author is trying to convey that love is not just about the highs and lows, but also the mundane and everyday aspects of life. The translation focuses more on the different aspects of love, but does not clearly convey the author's intent.

[Minor]: Omission - The translation omits the phrase "都市传说中的海枯石烂" (the sea of urban legends), which is an important part of the original text.

source: 质量超级差，包装松垮，没有分量，甚至不如路边地摊产品，没有克重，没有条码，十袋包装也是松松垮垮，完全不是合格产品的特征；是亚马逊最糟糕的购物体验，已经申请退货；完全属于质量问题；建议商家擦亮眼睛，拒绝劣质货；补充：又买了心相印，超市23元/10卷，加了几张对比照片，进一步验证了该产品的伪劣，为了给消费者更明确的参考，避免经济损失和进一步的心情不快！
target: quality super poor, packaging loose, no amount, even worse than roadside stalls products, no weight, no bar code, ten bags of packaging is also loose, is completely not a qualified product characteristics; is the worst shopping experience on Amazon, has applied for refund; totally belong to the quality issues; Advise merchants to wipe eyes, reject substandard goods; Add: bought a heart seal, supermarket 23 yuan / 10 volume, added several contrast photos, further confirm the quality of the product, in order to give consumers a clearer reference, to avoid economic loss and further dissatisfaction!
annotation:
MQM annotations:

Accuracy Errors
[Major]: Mistranslation - The translation "quality super poor" does not accurately convey the meaning of "质量超级差" which is more accurately translated as "extremely poor quality".
[Major]: Mistranslation - The translation "even worse than roadside stalls products" does not accurately convey the meaning of "没有分量，甚至不如路边地摊产品" which is more accurately translated as "no weight, even worse than products from roadside stalls".
[Major]: Omission - The translation omits the details about the lack of bar code and weight information on the product.

Terminology Errors
[Minor]: Incorrect term choice - The term "heart seal" is used to translate "心相印", which is a brand name and should be kept as is.

Linguistic Convention Errors
[Minor]: Grammar mistake - The phrase "is the worst shopping experience on Amazon" should be "was the worst shopping experience on Amazon".
[Minor]: Punctuation error - The translation lacks punctuation in some places, such as the period at the end of the first paragraph.

Style Errors
[Major]: Awkward expression - The phrase "wipe eyes" to translate "擦亮眼睛" is an awkward expression in English.
[Minor]: Overly literal phrasing - The translation "reject substandard goods" is a bit too literal compared to the more natural English expression "reject low-quality products".

Locale Conventions Errors
[Minor]: Incorrect format - The translation uses "/" to separate the price and quantity, whereas the more common format in English is to use "per" (e.g. "23 yuan per 10 rolls").

No-error
